ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Twisting Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I won t switch out weapons, but I will switch out instruments (easy once you get the hang of it) for the DOts (one target, drum and two chants with horn and
ygData.messageBody:
I won't switch out weapons, but I will switch out instruments (easy once you get the hang of it) for the DOts (one target, drum and two chants with horn and 18th song....more then two targets, then 1 chant and Chords with mandolin and 18th song with brass). I love how much faster I can kill something with my DOTs then with my Yaks.

If any of you all have played on test, there's a new feature that I'm hoping will be patched in tomorrow. 10 hot key banks of 10 hot keys each...now I can keep all my instruments and songs on one hotkey bank :) (though I don't know what I'll do with the other 90 hotkeys :). There's also 10 banks of socials (IIRC).

--Khelan, Bard of 42 songs, Tarew Marr
